name: Aeturna
startIntroPart2: Our roots are in the World Before Time and our limbs stretch beyond Heaven or Reckoning! We are infinite! We are eternal!
declaringWar: You grow into our path, your destruction is a necessary mercy for the future.
attacked: Only a fool would sever his own eternal salvation for his vain glory.
defeated: We are an infinite wave. If we fall now, it is only for a time, and we are destined to rise again. Farewell, until we meet again.
introduction: Good day! Let us trade ideas, so that we can grow prosperous.
hateHello: What filth do you wish to speak?
hateLetsHearIt: Perhaps there is hope for you, so speak and we will see.
hateNo: Do not make a mockery of our time.
hateYes: We agree, and hope this leads to better tidings from you.
afterPeace: Gratefully, you have come to see that reason will triumph over barbarism.
tradeRequest: We hope this trade would benefit you, what do you think?
